name: F****G BUGS
description:
You play for a guy who’s stuck in an abandoned castle, there very dark and you only have a flashlight but the main thing is not to overdo it, because LIGHT ATTRACTS BUGS

This is my first game and first gamejam, i hope you enjoy a little.

CONTROLS:

A-D - MOVE

E- FLASHLIGHT

Space - JUMP

GAME FOR ZENOJAM
